title: What Drink Does Baller Feel Like? - Follow the Liter
description:
Welcome to our newest show Follow the Liter, where we teach you how to make fancy drinks that will impress your friends. This week, the South Side!

Get a cocktail named after you here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Get Tim's "This Is What Baller Feels Like" shirt: http://www.districtlines.com/90052-What-Baller-Feels-Like/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Erick - http://twitter.com/castrodisiac

Music by Tonedeff: https://twitter.com/tonedeff

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up guys welcome to Follows the leader the show where we teach you how to make super cool drinks to impress your friends now I'm Tim Gettys I don't know how to do any of that so we got Eric Castro the master bartender to teach us a thing or two thanks for having me so Eric I'm going to drop a scenario on you real quick okay we're all up in the club and I look over and I see Nicki Minaj chilling and I'm like Nikki I want to get at you but I don't want to show her the Anaconda too quick you know I want to get her the drink I want I want her to be happy what drink do I need to get Nicki Minaj well that raised a lot of philosophical questions about what kind of drink Nicki Minaj would like to have naturally but you know what when I think of Hip Hop I think a j and juice so I think I got a little something perfect for what's it called the southide woo I like that so make a Southside we're going to do 3/4 Oz fresh squeezed lime [Music] juice three cold round simple syrup M

think I got a little something perfect for what's it called the southide woo I like that so make a Southside we're going to do 3/4 Oz fresh squeezed lime [Music] juice three cold round simple syrup M which is just equal parts water to equal parts sugar I can already tell Nikki's going to like this it wouldn't be a cocktail without a little bit of booze so I'm going to hit that with 2 oz of gin so she knows you're not playing around exactly well we already have the juice we have to have the Gin yep I'm going to grab some mint about 10 or 12 mint leaves fresh picked give it a good slap and drop those bad dogs inside I'm going fill this up with some Ice Ice Ice Baby another hip-hop classic so we're just going to shake that up we're shaking it out here we're also able to get Taylor Swift if Nikki is not interested I'm get my cocktail [Music] glass I'm going to strain all that out using a fine strainer right here you got all this little pieces of mint and everything out of my drink that's

is not interested I'm get my cocktail [Music] glass I'm going to strain all that out using a fine strainer right here you got all this little pieces of mint and everything out of my drink that's a damn fine strainer on my liquid garnish this with the spanked mint sprig sure she will appreciate I'mma float that right on top it's the hotness Southside there you go folks the Southside give it a try let me know what you [Music] think this is what baller feels like thank you so much Eric and thank you guys for watching let us know in the comments what you think and stay tuned for way more episodes teaching you how to make cocktails to impress your friends now Eric you have a special deal for us if you like me to come with the specialty cocktail just for you go to patreon.com kind ofun yeah it's going to be named after you and that's going to be pretty awesome all your friends are going to be super impressed and Nicki Minaj yeah she's going to take you home stay tuned here for the rest of

going to be named after you and that's going to be pretty awesome all your friends are going to be super impressed and Nicki Minaj yeah she's going to take you home stay tuned here for the rest of your life to watch a bunch of cool videos find out how to make a bunch of cool drinks and probably a lot of other cool stuff [Music] da da da
